column4: what about java isn't ready for 64-bit? (I'm running 64-bit ubuntu and I haven't had any problems with it)
There is no 64-bit browser plugin for any architecture from Sun. The only options for a *browser* plugin on 64-bit are unstable and not very compliant.
hmm.. I suppose you know what you're talking about.. but .. I thought I had 64-bit java in my firefox.. must check again
I've never yet been able to run *one* of the most common java apps I use in the plugins available to a native 64-bit browser
